text: Scrappy-Doo is a character in the long running series Scooby-Doo. He is a speaking dog that is Scooby-Doo’s nephew. He wasn’t well-liked. He is also the villain of the 2002 movie. ==Portrayals== Scrappy was first voiced by Don Messick before being replaced by Scott Innes. ==Appearances== ===Television series=== ===Films=== * Scooby-Doo (2002) Category:Anthromophic characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1979 Category:Fictional dogs Category:Scooby-Doo characters
title: Scrappy-Doo
